verses.verse: I exhort <S%G3870><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> <S%G3588><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G3588><s%> a fellow elder, <S%G4850><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> of the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and who will also <S%G2532><s%> share <S%G2844><s%> in the glory <S%G1391><s%> that will <S%G3195><s%> be revealed. <S%G601><s%>

Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> the flock <S%G4168><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> exercising the oversight, <S%G1983><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> under compulsion, <S%G317><s%> but <S%G235><s%> voluntarily, <S%G1596><s%> not <S%G3366><s%> for dishonest gain, <S%G147><s%> but <S%G235><s%> willingly; <S%G1596><s%>

neither <S%G3366><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> lording it over <S%G2634><s%> those entrusted <S%G2819><s%> to you, <S%G235><s%> but making <S%G1096><s%> yourselves examples <S%G5179><s%> to the flock. <S%G4168><s%>
When <S%G2532><s%> the chief Shepherd <S%G750><s%> is revealed, <S%G5319><s%> you will receive <S%G2865><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> that doesn't <S%G262><s%> fade away.

Likewise, <S%G3668><s%> you <S%G240><s%> younger <S%G3501><s%> ones, <S%G5293><s%> be subject to the elder. <S%G4245><s%> Yes, <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you clothe yourselves with <S%G1463><s%> humility, <S%G5012><s%> to subject yourselves to one another; <S%G5293><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> resists <S%G498><s%> the proud, <S%G5244><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to the humble. <S%G5011><s%>"

Humble yourselves <S%G5013><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the mighty <S%G2900><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may exalt <S%G5312><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> due time; <S%G2540><s%>

casting <S%G1977><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> worries <S%G3308><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G846><s%> cares <S%G3308><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

Be sober <S%G3525><s%> and self-controlled. <S%G1127><s%> Be watchful. <S%G3754><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> adversary, <S%G476><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> walks around <S%G4043><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a roaring <S%G5612><s%> lion, <S%G3023><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> he may devour. <S%G2666><s%>

Withstand <S%G436><s%> him <S%G3739><s%> steadfast <S%G4731><s%> in your faith, <S%G4102><s%> knowing that <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> brothers <S%G81><s%> who are in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> are undergoing <S%G2005><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> sufferings. <S%G3804><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> may the God <S%G2316><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> grace, <S%G5485><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G2248><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> after you have suffered <S%G3958><s%> a little while, <S%G3641><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2675><s%> <S%G99999><s%> perfect, <S%G2675><s%> establish, <S%G4741><s%> strengthen, <S%G4599><s%> and settle you. <S%G2311><s%>
To him <S%G846><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G2904><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Through <S%G1223><s%> Silvanus, <S%G4610><s%> our faithful <S%G4103><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I consider <S%G3049><s%> him, <S%G1223><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> briefly, <S%G3641><s%> exhorting, <S%G3870><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> testifying <S%G1957><s%> that this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G1511><s%> the true <S%G227><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you stand. <S%G2476><s%>

She who is in <S%G1722><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> chosen together with <S%G4899><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you; <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so does Mark, <S%G3450><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a kiss <S%G5370><s%> of love. <S%G26><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you <S%G5213><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
